text: The House of the Tolling Bell is a 1920 American silent mystery film directed by J. Stuart Blackton and starring May McAvoy, Bruce Gordon, and Morgan Thorpe.Goble p. 467 It is based on a novel written by Edith Sessions Tupper. ==Cast== * May McAvoy as Lucy Atheron * Bruce Gordon as Richard Steele * Morgan Thorpe as Anthony Cole * Edward Elkas as Innkeeper Ducros * Eulalie Jensen as Lola * William R. Dunn as Jules La Rocque * Edna Young as Aunt Stella * William Jenkins as Old George ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film.
